meta.description: Optimize the purchase of restaurants to maximize annual income within a budget constraint.

vars.name: purchase
vars.description: Binary decision variable for purchasing each restaurant

objective.name: max_total_income
objective.expr: sum(income[r] * purchase[r] for r in RESTAURANTS)
objective.description: Maximize total annual income from purchased restaurants

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(cost[r] * purchase[r] for r in RESTAURANTS)
constraints.description: Total cost of purchased restaurants must not exceed the budget

constraints.name: mutual_exclusivity_AD
constraints.description: Cannot purchase both Restaurant A and Restaurant D
